      • getEmotionBaseline

        public double getEmotionBaseline(Personality personality,
                        EmotionType type)
        Returns the baseline for the specified emotion type. The baseline depends on the character's personality.
        Parameters:
        personality - the character's personality
        type - the emotion type
        Returns:
        the emotion baseline.
